releaseNotes:
- **High-DPI Drawing**: Added support for Retina/High-DPI screens. Lines and shapes are now crisp and sharp.
- **Improved Flood Fill**: 
- **Improved Performance**: Drawing operations are now faster on high-resolution devices.
- **Zoom & Pan**: Added Pinch-to-Zoom and Drag-to-Pan support for easier filling of small details. Includes a "Reset Zoom" button.
